topic.title: SOPA is back, WhiteHouse drafty to censor internet (feat. Ajit Pai)
Typhoon Lekima - scary shit and marvels of Chinese engineering
Dont we need some categories here?
topic.body: Before it will turn into monocultured echo chamber. I guess sooner or later everyone gets tired or repetitive content. Just asking, dont shoot.

1565342542_16vtDQkRKY8atc9K3oCBTvMW1ojLL.body:
> [anonkraut](#comment_14_1JpWZr3hPmL8cYSKQCzuqUyhG25UuQsjPh): 1GB? It's 2019 mate. We are talking TB now.

He said "USB" ;)

1565338450_1Hbt9rJ8U9kpEFaxHAfLWzxWtKRYi.body:
Free speech without netiquette was, is and will be garbage. Sooner or later every site needs moderation. Reddit idea is brilliant - users creates streams/channels and moderate it with friends or trusted users. Look at Voat and you see where free speech is going.
Democracy doesnt work if IQ drops < 90

> [dsfkjdhskfhds](#comment_4_1KzwNCqdRAhnPoKktNh4t8ZSgpbzWWvLGx): you clowns can have any opinion you want. i don't care. i just don't want to see your bullcrap by default. that is all.

You DO understand in which group "you clowns" lands you, right? 
In many cases not in the one thats missed a lot

> [anonkraut](#comment_15_1JpWZr3hPmL8cYSKQCzuqUyhG25UuQsjPh): I don't need rules as long as I got regular expressions and a killfile.
Everything needs rules. Even if this is "no rules" rule.

> [zeronetanon4](#comment_52_1LT3fcyEShsU9E1H5wiBceWmEpU6LcK7v): We'll figure it out as time progresses.  It will be pretty challenging to balance all of the project's priorities in a decentralized environment.  I'm looking forward to be a part of it.

We shouldnt. It was right there from the very beginning of public internet and was called "netiquette" - boils down to simple "dont be moron". Sadly is dead now. The new norm is "give a man a mask, and he will show you his real face". Mostly the face belongs to some fuckin moron, but thats sign of times, I presume

> [zeronetanon4](#comment_53_1LT3fcyEShsU9E1H5wiBceWmEpU6LcK7v): minimal framework (perhaps optional on sites and not required) to protect its integrity and function

Very unpopular opinion: it shouldn't be minimal. It should censor the proverbial shit out of any public site to match human decency. There are no regular expressions to resolve it, nothing less that TensorFlow and SciKit. Otherwise will be sabotaged as soon as it gains popularity and will threat powers-that-be. Someone WILL start posting things that will force all 3 letter agencies to intervene and they will do it. Silk Road was full of invincible people.
4chan censored itself, altough I wouldnt call it "censorship". Even in regular classromm you throw fuckin morons off the group simply because they are fuckin morons. No need to tolerate them online

> [zeronetanon4](#comment_56_1LT3fcyEShsU9E1H5wiBceWmEpU6LcK7v): []

Technically theres nothing to do. You cant win the race. The best way to avoid morons is to not give them resons to come. First: needs successful downvote mechanism and hide posts below certain points by defaut. Users can, if they want, lower the threshold and scuba dive in shit if they please. Something like slashdot.org has. Methods are already there - well tested in clearnet. This would need some brainstorming but is definitely doable. What should be fixed is human factor, not technicals. The goal is that even if you will get unlimited count of saboteurs, SJW moron, shills, niggerfaggots of all sorts - they will be limited to threads. 
Is definitely better to hear "ZN hidden channels are full of shit" than "ZN is full of shit".

Or, I dont know, gold membership based on existing mechanisms like 1 USD lifetime certificate paid with CC or PayPal (not BTC) which will stop spammers and shills before they start (since one CC or PP can be used only once)
You ban CC/PP once - finito la musica, passato la fiesta - shill is out once and forever.
I wouldnt have problems to pay for it, majority of valuable banned YT people already pay for Vimeo etc. Maybe will fly, maybe will not. Maybe this is completely stupid idea. Or ingenious. 
Im pretty sure there are countless possibilities but tech arms race is not one of them.

1565321266_1LT3fcyEShsU9E1H5wiBceWmEpU6L.body:
Request 1USD paid with CC or Paypal, then allow it only once, problem solved. Or get SMS.
Oh I forgot, we are all partners in crime here. The well, tough shit, drown in the cloak.
Still anonymous, if the registration code will be publicly available - just compare hash of the phone number without storing it. Matter of trust, but completely doable. 
Again: Use phone like password is used. Compare salted hash, dont store it.

I would like to point the fact that whole Africa not only lack single written language but also never built a single fuckin road (not to mention city). Cambridge University was opened in 1209, way before we knew Africa even exists, so blaming whites is very convenient, but about as retarded as niggers can get.
How about you sort your fuckin degeneracy and imbecility first instead of demanding something that you cannot even describe, you obnoxious piece of shits? Then and only then we can start talking. Look Japan/China/Korea and recently India. Non-whites, hard working, intelligent and by definition - rising enemy of poor sandniggers who could disappear tomorrow and ther world wouldnt even notice.
